Name: Gingertini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A delicate cocktail with a warming hint of ginger.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Gingertini contains 214 calories
